Easy.Q: Which word is the opposite of Happy? Joyful, Sad, Excited, or Content?
Which word is the opposite of Big? Huge, Massive, Large, or Tiny?
Which word is the opposite of Hot? Warm, Cold, Mild, or Boiling?
Which word is the opposite of Fast? Slow, Rapid, Speedy, or Quick?
Which word is the opposite of Up? Above, Down, Over, or Higher?

Which word is the opposite of Open? Closed, Free, Wide, or Uncovered?
Which word is the opposite of Soft? Smooth, Cushiony, Hard, or Gentle?
Which word is the opposite of Full? Packed, Overflowing, Loaded, or Empty?
Which word is the opposite of Loud? Quiet, Soft, Muffled, or Calm?
Which word is the opposite of Light? Weightless, Heavy, Feathery, or Fragile?
Which word is the opposite of Young? Old, Ancient, Youthful, or Fresh?
Which word is the opposite of Happy? Cheerful, Miserable, Joyous, or Amused?
Which word is the opposite of Tall? Short, Long, High, or Giant?
Which word is the opposite of Wet? Damp, Dry, Soaked, or Steamy?

Hard.Q: Which word is the opposite of Increase? Decrease, Expand, Grow, or Rise?
